Package org.jclif.type

Provides the classes which defines the types, metadata and collections used by the framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommandInput This interface defines the properties which describes a command in a command line input.
CommandMetadata CommandMetadata interface defines the methods used to describe the properties of a command input.
Input Input interface is the common interface of all command line inputs.
InputMetadata InputMetadata interface defines the common properties of all command line input type.
OptionInput Option class represents the option parsed from a command line input.
OptionMetadata OptionMetadata interface defines the common properties that describes a command line option.
ParameterInput Parameter interface defines the common methods of a parameter.
ParameterMetadata This interfaces defines the properties which describes a command line parameter.
ParameterParser ParameterValidator interface provides the methods used by the parser to support custom parameter value parsing and value validation.
 

Class Summary
CommandConfiguration This class is collection class used to register all the commands supported by a command line application.
CommandInputImpl This class is a concrete implementation of Command interface.
CommandLineConfiguration CommandLineConfiguration class is used to define the command line inputs accepted by an application.
CommandLineProperties This class serves as container of command line related properties used for parsing like option prefix and option-parameter character delimiter.
CommandMetadataImpl This class provides concrete implementation of CommandMetadata interface.
Configuration<T extends InputMetadata> This class is a collection class used to store command line input configuration metadata information.
InputMetadataImpl This class provides concrete implementation of InputMetadata interface.
InputSet<E extends Input,M extends InputMetadata> This class is a collection which serves as container of all input types parsed from a command line input.
OptionConfiguration OptionConfiguration class serves as container of all metadata information of an applications expected command line options.
OptionInputImpl Option class represents an instance of an option parsed from the command line option list parsed by CommandLineFormat parse method.
OptionInputSet OptionSet class is a HashSet of Option type.
OptionMetadataImpl OptionMetadataImpl class provides the core implementation of OptionMetadata.
ParameterConfiguration ParameterConfiguration class serves as a container of all parameters accepted by a command line input configuration.
ParameterInputImpl This class is a concrete implementation of Parameter interface.
ParameterInputSet This class is a collection which serves as container of all parameters parsed from a command line input.
ParameterMetadataImpl This class provides concrete implementation of ParameterMetadata interface.
 

Enum Summary
OptionMetadata.IdentifierType Identifier type.
ParameterType ParameterType enum defines the different option parameter types supported.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidIdentifierException InvalidIdentifierException exception is thrown if an input identifier is invalid.
 

Package org.jclif.type Description

Provides the classes which defines the types, metadata and collections used by the framework.

Since:
1.0
